title: SecurityScheme
description: Defines an authentication/authorization mechanism for the API. Supports four scheme types: apiKey (name+in required), http (scheme required), oauth2 (flows required), and openIdConnect (openIdConnectUrl required). Only 'type' is universally required. Note: SecurityScheme defines the mechanism; it is referenced by name string key in Operation.security or the root security array — those references are security requirement objects, not SecurityScheme instances.

openIdConnectUrl.description: OpenID Connect discovery URL, required when type is openIdConnect
